name: moonbound (Santtu "MFG38" Pesonen)
description:
moonbound is a short, casual Metroidvania-style game where you control a... thing that crash-landed onto an alien planet and help him/her/them/it find extra jumps and get back to his/her/their/its rocket.

Made for Metroidvania Month 19.

CONTROLS

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Jump/Confirm

R - Reset

Esc - Exit
